Name: Anti-Bully Adventure
About the game: You're a person who has been getting bullied online, then you find a comment that looks positive and decide to click the link attached. An evil virus corrupts your computer and you have to try to get rid of it. Will you be able to do it? Play one of the most anticipated 2d platformers of all time, with epic and insane boss battles and the most engaging story in a game since The Rest Of We, explore various 2D platformer levels each with their own separate way through them, use your phone to dial a friend to help you track down a bully, and destroy the virus on your computer once and for all!
